about_the_game:
Step into the vibrant world of Azooma Escape with this free demo, offering a sneak peek into the first 4 levels of the game. Join the introverted boy as he embarks on a quirky and comedic journey to avoid family gatherings at all costs. This demo showcases the core mechanics, humor, and unique cultural flavor of the game.

Overview

  • The First 4 Levels: Explore the lively old Arabic village and experience the boy’s initial escapades as he dodges social interactions in creative and humorous ways.

  • Core Gameplay Mechanics: Get hands-on with the reverse stealth gameplay, including hiding in furniture, throwing objects, and solving puzzles to escape family members.

  • Cultural and Artistic Flair: Immerse yourself in a setting inspired by Arab culture, with charming visuals and relatable, comedic scenarios.

  • Engaging Puzzles and Strategies: Test your creativity and quick thinking as you navigate obstacles and avoid interactions.

Key Features:

Traverse a lively old Arabic village at your own pace.

Uncover family secrets and hidden areas as you move through different houses.

Follow the boy on his quirky quest to congratulate his uncle while avoiding endless party invitations from his generous family.

Dive into chaotic gameplay that makes running away a thrilling and fun experience.

Use inventive strategies to avoid interactions and stay true to the boy's introverted nature.

Solve engaging world puzzles that test your creativity and strategic thinking.

Navigate humorous obstacles and find clever solutions to tricky situations.

Experience art and gameplay inspired by Arab culture.

Participate in culturally inspired situations and interactions that add depth and authenticity to the game.

Enjoy the comedic aspect of evading family members by throwing small objects and finding unique hiding spots.

Laugh along with the boy's amusing adventures and clever antics.

Why You'll Love Azooma Escape

"Azooma Escape" offers a unique blend of humor, action, and stealth in a culturally rich setting. The game promises a fresh and engaging experience filled with laughter, surprises, and heartwarming moments. Whether you're dodging family members or solving creative puzzles, "Azooma Escape" delivers a delightful and memorable adventure that stands out in the action-adventure genre.

The word "Azooma Escape" is an Arabic word meaning invitation or gathering. In the game, it refers to the gathering the player is dragged into. Embark on this amusing journey and discover the joy of "Azooma Escape." Your adventure awaits!
